"...Our backs are up against the wall th: "I've heard those Luminmechs are real dangerous just by themselves, and they come at you by the dozen."
"They say we ARKS can beat 'em, but I just don't think I'm up to it..."
"They're so strong and so fast, and there's so many, and on top of that we've gotta fight 'em in space?!"
"So do your thing, killer. Show me how you take those things down. Seriously, I'm stumped!"
